TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFeatureSupport

summary.span: 指定從目前系統擷取功能資訊的標準介面。

span.span: Specifies a standard interface for retrieving feature information from the current system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別中實作時提供您可用來判斷是否系統上目前安裝的功能，以及取得某項功能的版本號碼的方法。When implemented in a class, provides methods you can use to determine whether a feature is currently installed on the system and to get the version number of a feature. 呼叫來判斷是否一項功能或特定版本的功能，目前已安裝。Call to determine whether a feature, or a specific version of a feature, is currently installed. 呼叫來判斷已安裝的功能的版本號碼。Call to determine the version number of an installed feature. 請參閱和實作這個介面的類別。See the and classes for implementations of this interface. ## Examples 下列範例會使用實作查詢功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Version GetVersionPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version

span.span: The feature whose version is requested.
Retrieves the version of the specified feature.

returns.span: ，表示指定功能的版本號碼；如果未安裝功能，則為 。

span.span: A representing the version number of the specified feature; or if the feature is not installed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的實作，請參閱。For an implementation of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會使用實作查詢功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 決定指定的功能目前在系統上是否可以使用。

span.span: Determines whether the specified feature is currently available on the system.

Public Function IsPresent (feature As Object) As Boolean

summary.span: 決定指定功能的任何版本目前在系統上是否可以使用。

span.span: Determines whether any version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.

returns.span: 如果功能存在，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the feature is present; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用實作查詢功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsPresent (object feature, Version minimumVersion);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPresent(object feature, class System.Version minimumVersion) cil managed
Public Function IsPresent (feature As Object, minimumVersion As Version) As Boolean
public: bool IsPresent(System::Object ^ feature, Version ^ minimumVersion);

param.name: minimumVersion
param.span: ，表示所要尋找之功能的最小版本號碼。

span.span: A representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.

summary.span: 決定目前在系統中是否可以使用指定功能的指定或較新的版本。

span.span: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.

returns.span: 如果功能的要求版本存在則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the requested version of the feature is present; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用實作查詢功能。The following example uses the implementation of and queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form.
